title: Sunfury
summaries: The Sunfury is a flail that emits light when thrown and has a chance to inflict the On Fire! debuff. It can be obtained from Shadow Chests in The Underworld as well as from Obsidian Lock Boxes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) found in Obsidian(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Hellstone Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). The Sunfury deals the most damage out of all pre-Hardmode flails.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
